contents:
Jax今天重开海滩了老哥怎么看？

Visitors cheer as Jacksonville beaches reopen
Mayors of beach communities urge people to follow guidelines or they could close again

刺激哦
Jacksonville Beach Mayor Chalie Latham said Friday that officials will have police, lifeguards and Jacksonville Fire-Rescue personnel patrol the waterfront to ensure people are maintaining six feet of social distancing and there are no groups of more than 10 -- not 50 as was previously announced.
